name: The Best Moist Lotus Cookie Butter Banana Bread Recipe Ever
author: Carla Maria
summary: Hey its Carla Bruno from CarlasCakes! Here is another great recipe I had to share with you. I am obsessed with banana bread and so it my husband, and I am also obsessed with Lotus Cookie Butter! If you don't know what that is yet, I strongly suggest you become familiar because I am telling you, it is the best thing ever! There are lots of different types of cookie butters. However, I love Lotus because it has a caramel taste to it.
ingredients: ½ cup European cookie spread (such as Biscoff®)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a loaf pan with cooking spray
Combine sugar and butter in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy
Mix 1 1/2 cup plus 3 tablespoons cake flour, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Pour half of the batter into the prepared pan
Heat cookie spread in the microwave until softened, about 20 seconds
Spread over the batter in the pan
Cover with remaining banana batter; swirl decoratively with a knife
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes
Cool in the pan for 5 minutes
Cool for 10 to 15 minutes before serving
